IsCameraView.description: Whether the positioning of this object is used as camera position(?)

Distance.description: The distance this camera stays away from the player.

PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

Azimuth.description: I'm really tired and this one's hard to explain, please just google azimuth thx.

LimitUpScrollDistance.description: How far this camera is allowed to scroll upwards.

LimitDownScrollDistance.description: How far this camera is allowed to scroll downwards.

IsLimitPathDistance.description: Whether there should be a limit on the distance this camera is allowed to travel from the path.

LimitPathDistanceMin.description: The minimum distance this camera can travel from the path.

LimitPathDistanceMax.description: The maximum distance this camera can travel from the path.

OrientationMode.description: How this camera is oriented. Gravity orientation means the camera will always face upwards. Path Normal orientation makes the camera rotate based on the normals of each vertex on the path.

IsEnableAzimuthOffset.description: Whether the Azimuth value above should apply.

IsSmoothPath.description: Whether to smooth how this camera travels along the path.

Extra.value: A 2D Camera set to follow the player along a path.
